56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Amr bin Al-Harith:The Prophet (ﷺ) did not leave anything behind him after his death except a white mule, his arms and a piece of land which he left to be given in charity

chapter.ara-name: باب بَغْلَةِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم الْبَيْضَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: The white mule of the Prophet (ﷺ) ﷺ
